author: Ben Henry
title: Tom Hanks Urged People To Stay Home During The Coronavirus Outbreak After Revealing That He And Rita Wilson Have Recovered
description: Two weeks after announcing that he and his wife, Rita Wilson, had tested positive for COVID-19, Tom revealed that the couple are finally feeling better. View Entire Post ›
content: instagram.com"We felt a bit tired, like we had colds, and some body aches," Tom wrote on Instagram. "Rita had some chills that came and went. Slight fevers too. To play things right, as is needed in the world right now, we were tested for the Coronavirus, and… [+27 chars]
